text: I vaguely recall some discussions around syntax highlighting on StackOverflow, was that ever resolved? I just answered a question here: <https://stackoverflow.com/a/66364331/2499892> and noticed how the highlighted code became all funny because I used the derivative operator in Zygote `'` and SO thought everything after that was a string/character...
